description.en:
Bitcoin E-Wallet, supported in over 160 countries, is a combination of speed, security and easy to use in a fully custodial crypto wallet.
BITWALLET is also PCI-DSS compliant and adheres to the PCI standard in providing a higher level of data security. 
Bitwallet's simple design offers a much-needed entryway for everyday people to start using cryptocurrency”
